## useDataTableOutput() function

Uses the latest table from a data package. This is updatde as the package changes

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useDataTableOutput(pkg: DataTable | undefined): Maybe<TableContainer>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pkg | DataTable \| undefined | The data package to load the table from |

<b>Returns:</b>

Maybe&lt;TableContainer&gt;

The latest table
